com.tweetcrawl.ontology

Class Quote

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tweetcrawl.ontology.Quote
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Predicate, java.io.Serializable

    public class Quote
extends java.lang.Object
implements jade.content.Predicate
    Predicate used to inform a QuoteGraphGenerator agent about a new quote (as a retweet) linked to a term. This information requires the QuoteOntology ontology to be used.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
